content:
napoleon taking over france is alarming

“There is on the globe one single spot, the possessor of which is our natural and habitual enemy. It is New Orleans, through which the produce of three-eighths of our territory should pass to market ... France placing herself in that door, assumes to us the attitude of defiance...The day that France states possession of New Orleans….we must marry ourselves to the British fleet and nation.” - Thomas Jefferson
	jefferson, a pro-france guy, says this!
	he mentions “marry[ing] ourselves to the british fleet and nation” even though he's like freaking pro-france
